basics.summary: I am a software developer with experience developing scalable applications in the node. J's, j2ee and c + +. I love coding in dynamic programming languages like javascript. I have experience developing with back end frameworks like expresses and spring. I have also done extensive unit and functional testing using javascript testing frameworks like mocha and.

references.reference: brandon hubbard was a fantastic Madonna to work with. strong team player. makes the impossible possible., i used to work hard to work on Madonna projects, but after our us colleagues discovered his work and talent, he also started working on global projects and. Madonna is an exceptional designer and a great colleague. someone i like to work with again in the future., Madonna is a conscientious, skilled and versatile, who knows exactly how to put himself in the shoes of the customer / user. he has excellent attention to detail which makes a huge difference to the great team work with. he always contributed to having a happier and more productive working environment. he dedicated to teaching and educating his coworkers and clients. and always open to learning new things work or on the best practices he, always striving to adopt the best solution to any problem. among all the things he did, he managed to convert the existing monolithic application into a micro services architecture, drastically improving the previous deployment flow and source code maintenance. he is one of the best developers i been lucky to work with so far, he puts passion in what he does and he can easily inspire and transfer his passion to all his team members.
